characters.name: Yeo-Un Cheon
characters.description:
He was a member of the Cheon Family and was the son of a female servant who worked at the Lord’s chamber and was not from the Six Clans. Although considered as an illegitimate son of the Lord due to a servant mother, he was still part of the Cheon family and he had the right to the throne but had an extremely low chance without support. 

He doesn't learn any martial arts in his early 15 years due to his oath with the Lord's wives from Six Clans. After entering the Demonic Academy, only then did he learn Martial Arts and have an unimaginable growth rate due to Nano Machine'a support.

characters.name: Mun-Gyu
characters.description: Gyu Mun is the female protagonist of Nano Machine. She is the granddaughter of Yun Mun, one of the elders of the Demonic Cult. She is a part of Yeo-Woon Cheon's team during their stay in the Demonic Academy. ~!She is Yeo-Woon's future first wife.!~

characters.name: Heo-Bong
characters.description: He is Cheon Yeo-Un's first subordinate.

characters.name: Baek-Gi
characters.description: Coming from the Gentle Kick Clan, he is one of the most trusted followers of Cheon Yeo-Woon.

characters.name: Wang-Heul Go
characters.description:
He is from the upper sect of the Magic Sword Sect and is a master of martial arts. He is the first of the six swords.

~!In a relationship with Ho Sang-Hwa!~

characters.name: Sang-Hwa Ho
characters.description: She is the first female warrior who joined Yeo-Woon Cheon in the Demonic Academy and one of his Six Swords. She joined him because of his strength and his character as a leader.

characters.name: Maeng Seop
characters.description: The Right Guardian of the Demonic Cult. His nickname is Crazy Blade, due to his drunkard-like and unpredictable blade skills. He is the first Teacher Yeo-Woon Cheon had in his martial arts journey.

characters.name: Hwa-Myeong Lee
characters.description: He is the head of the Demonic Academy.

characters.name: Baek
characters.description: ~!Lady Baek is the one who asked the Poison Clan to poison Lady Hwa, Yeo-Woon's mother.!~

characters.name: Ga-Gyeong Jang
characters.description: Ga-Gyeong Jang was the parental figure of Yeo-Woon Cheon's early life and served Lady Hwa until she died. He went to crown Yeo-Woon as the Lord of the Demonic Cult during his Coronation Ceremony.

characters.name: Yeon Hwa
characters.description: Lady Hwa (Yeon Hwa) was Yeo-Woon Cheon's Mother and the Seventh wife of Cheon-Yu Jong. She was poisoned and died when Yeo-Woon was little. ~!Later on, it was revealed by Jong-Seom Cheon that the one who poisoned her was Lady Mu.!~

characters.name: Yu-Jong Cheon
characters.description: Yu-Jong Cheon is the Lord of the Demonic Cult and the Father of Yeo-Woon Cheon. He was one of the Top Five Strongest Masters in the entire Murim and succeeded in the title 'Southern Demon Lord' after Inji Cheon.

characters.name: Mu-Hwa Yeon
characters.description: Mu-Hwa Yeon is the 2nd Council Elder of the Demonic Cult (Formerly 10th) as well as the only female elder aside from Soyu Hang. ~!Later, she was acknowledged as the true successor of the Sword Demon lineage.!~

characters.name: Ran-Yeong Mun
characters.description: She was one of the twelve expert martial artists from the Demonic Cult that were tasked to protect the Kirin blood.
